title: CREDIT ANALYST (M/F)
description:
For a Shared Service Center in Berlin/Potsdam (Germany) we are looking for a

CREDIT ANALYST (M/F)

The Credit Analyst works in a team, which provides analytical services for Operations in various European
countries. He/she provides opinions and recommendations as to the relative risk of lending money, in the form
of various financial products, to commercial customers. 

These opinions and recommendations enable the
approval authority to make a decision in full knowledge of the associated risks. The speed and quality of this
service directly affects our clients ability to increase assets and contributes to his competitive advantage.

Major/Key Activities:
* Obtains all relevant information for recommendations
* Analyses new applications for commercial credit
* Interprets signs of increasing risk
* Provides recommendations to approval authorities
* Ensures adequate security is in place
* Monitors existing commercial credit lines
* Assess business opportunities
* Works as part of a team to ensure performance goals are met

Essential Skills:
* Fluent Swedish language skills
* Strong English language skills
* Economics studies with a finance specialization at a university with an appropriate degree/certificate or
equivalent
* Knowledge in analysing commercial financial statements (including audited balance sheets, profit & loss
accounts and other financial statements) of common or complicated structured groups of companies and
experience in using different applicable analysis methods and ratios, including cash flow and EBIDT
* PC literate, especially MS Office

Preferred Skills:
* Accounting knowledge
* Knowledge of Swedish corporate law
* Knowledge of different European accounting standards
* German language skills
